name: Golden Valkyrie
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare JAM 40 -  "The more you have, the worse it is"

You are a Valkyrie who must defeat her enemies with a halberd boomerang and collect the gold to get bigger and earn more points, but the bigger you are, the more vulnerable and slow you get.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Attack
  • X: Drop your gold.

Features:

  • Online Highscores;
  • Dynamic Difficulty;
  • 3 Enemies;
  • 1 Mini-Boss;
